author: Ewan Palmer
title: New York Asian Man Allegedly Targeted in Racist Attack Days After AG Launches Coronavirus Hate Crime Hotline
description: Victim spat on in Brooklyn subway station as New York Attorney General Letitia James condemns those using COVID-19 to be "racist, xenophobic, or biased."
content:
Police in New York are investigating yet another alleged incident of an Asian person in the city being targeted in a hate crime attack as a result of the coronavirus outbreak.
According to reports, a 26-year-old Asian male was waiting at the Atlantic Ave./Ba… [+5292 chars]
